member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_CONVERSION_ARGUMENTS
member.summary: Specifies the parameters for decode output conversion. is used for the same purpose, but provides additional fields for output width and output height.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_CONVERSION_ARGUMENTS.Enable
member.summary: A boolean value indicating whether decode conversion should be used.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_CONVERSION_ARGUMENTS.pReferenceTexture2D
member.summary: A pointer to an containing the native decoding output. When downsampling is enabled, the output at native decode resolution, color space, and format may be required for future decode submissions (as reference frames, for instance).

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_CONVERSION_ARGUMENTS.ReferenceSubresource
member.summary: The subresource index of the resource provided in pDecodeTexture2D to use.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_CONVERSION_ARGUMENTS.OutputColorSpace
member.summary: A value from the enumeration specifying the target color space of the output.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_CONVERSION_ARGUMENTS.DecodeColorSpace
member.summary: A value from the enumeration specifying the source-decoded color space before conversion.
